title: Sendinblue
description:
Trusted by over 500,000 businesses worldwide, Sendinblue is an all-in-one marketing platform for engaging with your contacts and building better customer relationships through targeted and meaningful communication. Cover your entire marketing funnel with one single tool. 

Focus areas
Broadcast Campaigns via Email Marketing, SMS and WhatsApp Campaigns
Marketing Automation (Transactional Email and SMS)
Conversations (Live Chat, WhatsApp, Instagram Direct, Facebook Messenger)
